website_summaries.verdict: Blue Buffalo formula focuses on providing key nutrients for kittens, but the price is a bit higher than other brands.
pros: Customers report an improvement in kitten's coat and breath
Can migrate to adult version as kitten ages
cons: Some pet owners said their kittens did not like the taste of this food

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Cat Lady Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I've feed my sweet orange tabby and my current foster kitten this food. I started them with the Science Diet Kitten food that is provided through the foster program but ended up switching to this. They love it. After feeding my cat this food for 2 months, I've noticed his breath has gotten better and his coat is softer and shinier. They eat this along with the Freedom Indoor Kitten food.
customer_reviews.author: DRR

customer_reviews.title: Natural and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I always look for natural products to feed my pets. BLUE is one of the better brands on the market and my cat has been eating their products exclusively with sheer delight. I appreciate how the cat food doesn't smell too strongly, which gives a peace of mind that my cat is eating a truly healthy product that is free of additives.
customer_reviews.author: RVS

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: My little kitten was given to me a bit too early, around 5 weeks. He was very small, only weighed a pound. I gave him this, 1/4 cup twice a day and after a little over a month he is 3 pounds, full of energy and is healthy. The quality is great and the size of the food is perfect. Ive read a lot of schety reviews about buying animal food off amazon and it being terrible (fake, not actual product) but this is it. All legit. I recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, used on two kittens
customer_reviews.text: After we got a new kitten about two years ago fed them regular store brand kitten food. Noticed constipation and very bad farts/ litter smell. This was recommended to us by someone and those issues immediately went away. Picked up a shelter kitten and that cat liked the food too. Both of them are almost adults and have grown healthily. Glad it helped to reduce the fart and litter smell because with what aromas the cats can create from quality food I can't imangine, well smell, what would come from the cheaper stuff.
customer_reviews.author: MT Dude

customer_reviews.title: Kitten crack
customer_reviews.text: My 2 6 month old kittens have been eating this since I brought them home at 8 weeks. Its like crack! They can not get enough! The last time I ordered, it was 3 days late and they were SO distraught about it (I had a stock supply of wet food and raw food so they were totally fine.) when it finally came they knew what it was before i opened the box and when I served them.....kibbles EVERYWHERE! They pretty much went swimming in the bowl. I had never seen cats so grateful for some kibbles!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Wanted A Great Food
customer_reviews.text: Our pets are extremely important to our family, so we always want the best for them. That includes what they eat. I bought Blue Buffalo for our kitten (and another bag for our dog) because I'd always heard about Blue Buffalo's quality. It didn't work well for my pets. We switched all of them over gradually, but within a week after putting them on only Blue Buffalo I began noticing stomach issues in one of our kittens and my dog. I'm wondering if it was something to to with the Life Source bits. At any rate, we tossed both bags and have since found a food that agrees with all three.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L.

customer_reviews.title: It's kitten food!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty isn't really very finicky about food so naturally she devours this anytime we feed it to her. I typically would buy this but forgot to one time and bought her another type at the store and I noticed that it seemed like she stopped putting on weight as fast as she had been. She may be hitting a plateau with her growth, so I'm not sure if the food made a difference, but based on what I'm seeing from researching different brands, there are higher protein/fat options available. I'm not a vet or cat expert though, so my lazy perspective is probably no good. Thought people might want to hear someone else's experience, though.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Nutrional and the kitten likes it
customer_reviews.text: For years, I've given my dogs and cats Blue Buffalo. I do believe it is better than the supermarket pet foods which have "by-products" in them. Now I have a kitten, so I bought Blue Buffalo kitten food. He eats it. I'm happy. Prices do vary, so make sure that you price it out, here and at Petco, to get yourself the best deal.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Jan

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly kitten goodness
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. My cute little kitty screeches in my ear every morning at the crack of dawn until I get up to feed him some of this stuff. Before finding this brand, he wanted to eat my food and dog food but had ZERO interest in his actual kitten food. Now, he can't go without it. Every day when I get off work he runs up to his food bowl. And he finally stopped attacking me when I eat my food! It's a win-win. Enjoy this picture of my healthy, happy kitty in a bow tie. I'm happy when he's happy, and he's happy when he eats this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Madzy

customer_reviews.title: Oh nooo....never again
customer_reviews.text: My vet told me a year ago to stop feeding .my cats Blue Buffalo due to diarrhea and vomiting. It is much too rich..his words. Blue seems to be trying to take over the pet food industry with Mega ads, and now selling in grocery stores. I NEVER want to go through that again with my cats. It might taste good, but they pay in another way. A.s far as flavor goes, i gave 3 stars , assuming that's what attracts them to the food. But I don't eat it so ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat thinks it’s a winner.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten seems to really like this food. I researched the brands that have the best ingredients and this one was toward the top so I thought I’d give it a try. My only complaint is that the smell seems to be a bit strong for a dry cat food. If I have it in the kitchen, I can smell it through the house. Anything for my cat though!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: ... from regular kitten chow to this and its been amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I made a change from regular kitten chow to this and its been amazing!!! My kittens love this food so much.. They both had ok coats but after the food change they now have glossy coats and are very soft. I wish I would have made the change earlier they are full of energy now and the poop smell from the litter box is SIGNIFICANTLY less.. Once they get to 1yr old i will continue to use the blue buffalo brand of cat food!
customer_reviews.author: B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients, but sadly my cat doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I really love the quality ingredients of this food, however my aging cat will barely touch it. I tried going with this because it seemed like it could help my aging cat that's not eating and is extremely sensitive in her later years. I was really hoping this would work for her, but it's not. But I will say a positive is, the little bit of this food she did try, she was able to hold down and didn't throw it up. So that's a good thing. She just doesn't like it enough to really eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: We switched to this brand after reading so much about other brand that mostly contain ingredients that lead to weight gain but no real nutrients. Blue Buffalo has real ingredients that are healthy and won’t just “fill up the cat”. The previous brands we bought led to a stinky litter box. Once we switched, the cats don’t stink the litter box! Cats enjoy the taste and switched easily. I’m happy we changed! It’s a little more pricey but worth it long term.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: My kitten absolutely love the blue buffalo dry cat food
customer_reviews.text: My kitten absolutely love the blue buffalo dry cat food. For years I fed my pets foods that I thought were of high quality such as science diet and royal canine. After seeing all the fillers and the first ingredients of these other brands as being a chicken byproduct I wanted to switch to something with a real first ingredient. My adult cats are all on the adult blue buffalo formula but this is the first kitten I've started on the blue buffalo diet. So far she loves it and is happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Shiny Coat and She Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This food was recommended by our vet, it has the right nutrients and gives my kitten a shin coat to prove it! This food does have a strong smell compared to other foods we tried. When her food is out she has no interest in her older siblings food, I believe it is because the strong smell of it. My older cats are interested in her kibbles, but she doesn’t care about theirs. We fed her this til she was a year old then weaned her as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great kitty food
customer_reviews.text: My two kitties are extremely picky and will turn their nose up at almost anything else. I have been feeding them Blue Buffalo since they were 6 weeks old and they love this stuff! They also have thick, shiny coats and were able to put on a healthy amount of weight. I have been ordering off Amazon and the food is always fresh. Overall, I feel good about what I’m feeding them and will recommend this brand to anyone I know with cats.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Truly high quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about Blue Buffalo, though my finicky new kitten is hard to please. She got through about half of this bag before turning her nose up, which is what she does with pretty much every dry food. I have a tupperware container that holds a week's worth of kibble at a time, so it's not a case of the bag being opened and exposed to the air several times a day -- just a picky feline! Still, I'll keep rotating through the different varieties once she's old enough for adult food because I like the brand so much.
customer_reviews.author: ShereKhan0074

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the only hard food my kittens have eaten since transitioning from wet kitten food and they love it! I feel confident that I'm giving them great nutrition and feeding them something hearty and safe with minimal fillers and byproduct. Never struggled with any digestion issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitten in Wisconsin
customer_reviews.text: When I brought my five month old kitten home from the local humane society, I began to feed her Blue Buffalo and she immediately chowed it down and started to gain weight. While it looks like she will remain a very small cat once full grown, she will eat only this and leaves wet food or even chicken left overs alone. She loves the stuff so much she seldom even chews it, preferring to wolf it down. It is pricey but I prefer to spend my money on food receipts and not vet bills. She is a gorgeous black and white long-haired cat with a beautiful shiny coat and bushy tail. You are what you eat!
customer_reviews.author: Plaid

customer_reviews.title: A huge change!
customer_reviews.text: When we got our kittens, they had been fed Iams, we used to use blue buffalo for our dogs and always loved it. When we changed over the kittens, their coats became noticeably softer and shinier. This is exactly the sort of thing we expect from Blue Buffalo food, and we feel it's definitely worth the price. It's also a bit embarrassing, but equally impressive, that we're quite certain that our kittens have a more balanced and complete diet than we do ourselves. I guess that's the benefit of not being tempted by chocolate cake, ha!
customer_reviews.author: ErikS

customer_reviews.title: Superior Dry Kibblet - Far Superior to Every Other Blend
customer_reviews.text: Read the ingredients. This is a superior product. My kitten has thrived on it. I found that the kitten has always eaten less than the "recommended" servings, but the food was always made available and fresh, and it ate to appetite. Has gained weight at exactly the rate for optimal growth. Started feeding to a sickly next door cat; recovered with an improved diet. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo LIES about ingredients!!
customer_reviews.text: Blue Buffalo LIES about what it puts in its food. Look up recent lawsuits and then decide if you want to gamble with your precious little one's health for yourself. We switched to Acana.
customer_reviews.author: Chad I

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves it & it’s good for him!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good food for my adopted feral kitten. (We found him outside in our yard with his siblings. We were only able to catch him. We had him neutered and given all the necessary vaccinations). He loves it and is growing into a beautiful, healthy cat!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good for the elderly kitties.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a couple of my elderly cats who are seeming a bit thin. They love it and empty the bowl completely by the end of the day. I haven't noticed any weight gain, but it' s early still. I will keep this one in my rotation of high quality dry food, although I feed them all mainly wet food two or three times a day. Basically, since they are elderly, I feed them wet any time they act hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Beth B.

customer_reviews.title: and his fur was dull and felt coarse
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cat food that my picky kitten will eat. I tried other higher end kitten foods and he just wasn't as into them as he is this one. When we first got him, the food that he was being fed was for adult cats, and his fur was dull and felt coarse. During the course of a few days eating this food, it was like he completely changed! His fur was soft, and shiny and he looked very healthy. A lot of reviewers have complained about stinky poop, but I haven't noticed his poop being stinkier than..well...poop. It works for us!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: No longer a kitten but....
customer_reviews.text: I got my kitten Mason from a farm after his mother died. He was only 4 weeks old and malnourished. Decided to try this kitten food when he was able to eat kibble. He loved it and this is the only food he would to eat. Problem is he is now over a year old and still only wants the kitten kibble. This is his favorite. I have tried other brands but this is all he wants. He is a healthy and happy big boy now.
customer_reviews.author: empierce

customer_reviews.title: Kitten is happy, vet is happy
customer_reviews.text: When we adopted our kitten, we asked what food he’s been given at the shelter. I bought what I thought was that food, but it looked different than the handful they gave me. Our poor guy had loose stools for a week. I thought it was just because I accidentally transitioned him too quickly. But I thought I’d give this stuff a go and problem solved! He seems to like it and when the vet asked what he was on, she told us that she was pleased with our choice. The only thing is that the litter box is pretty stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline R. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Cat hates it
customer_reviews.text: So tried to upgrade my cats food. Again FDA included cat food in its study looking for causes of DCM in dogs & cats. Apparently my dog & cat watched the news together because he wouldn’t eat this. I tried mixing it with the old food but no dice. He started eating the dog’s food.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Kitten likes it - She is big and healthy now!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Normally I purchase Purina Kitten Chow, but the last kitten I rescued was anemic from having such a bad flea infestation. She was extremely weak, and the Purina seemed to me making her feel worse. So I switched to this, and she seemed to enjoy it and ate it up fine. Now she is a healthy, strong, spunky kitten! I rated the scent as 1 star because it smells like fish food... which is weird. But, again, she likes it and it has helped her grow big and strong!
customer_reviews.author: kdizzle

customer_reviews.title: Just try it once and you'll notice the difference in this versus the cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: I used to feed my cats Purina indoor formula but decided to try switching them to this because of the higher quality ingredients. After about the first week i was amazed at how much softer and healthier their fur felt and looked. And it's really not much more expensive than the other crap I was feeding them. I just wish i would've realized it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Saved a Kitten
customer_reviews.text: Rescued a kitten that was found outside, scrawny, sick, and rust colored. At roughly six weeks old was more fur than anything else, within a month he reached a healthy weight, and his fur was nearly free of the rust color he came to me as. He is now almost a year old, and happy as can be, and according to the vet very healthy! Attached are before and after photos spanning a few months
customer_reviews.author: randomuser

customer_reviews.title: Best dry food on the market.
customer_reviews.text: We adopted the sickest and smallest kitten at the animal shelter because my daughter fell in love with him. He was extremely malnourished and sick. We were given Science Diet by the vet, which he unhappily ate with help. We tried Blue Buffalo and he's blossomed on this. He is healthy and spunky now. We'll never change his food. He happily eats it, his stools are firm and because it's so high quality, we feed less than the other brands. This product is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: My kittens love this food
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this food, it also has really helped with the scent of their excrement. The room where their litter box was stayed musty even though I clean the litter box twice daily. So I changed their food, they love it and it has all of the great things that they need. Now I have no issues with smell. It is a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Our 4 kittens love this food
customer_reviews.text: Blue buffalo is good quality food and our 4 kittens gobble it up...their coats are shiny their eyes are clear and their teeth are clean and white. Very happy with this food. Better priced than other brands in this class.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Limehouse

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This food made my kittens very sick after 2 days of eating it. I will never put them through that again. I will not support this brand (Blue).
customer_reviews.author: Neah

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat is over 3 years old, but I thought he was a little too thin. I didn't want to just get him fat, but hoped the nutrients would keep him well. He like it. I mix it half and half with his indoor cat formula. It will take time to see if this makes any difference/
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Blue is true!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my kitten since he was 6 weeks old and now he's 4 months. Let me tell you, it seems like I've tried every food on the market and he has lose/runny stool forever. I took him to the vet multiple times and he's as healthy as could be. I then switched to this dry food and it not only STOPPED THE LOSE STOOL, but it keeps him looking nice and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t personally tried it myself, but my kittens love it.
customer_reviews.author: JAN

customer_reviews.title: BEST kitten food!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest food for kittens...I use both this and the Wilderness kitten by Blue Buffalo, and they love both of them. Even my adult cats love it, but it is high in calories, so keep it away from your older ones. My older ones get their own Blue Buffalo mix.....only the best for my babies!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Alldridge

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loved this food he ate it up and I think it helped with his throwing up. He has a sensitive stomach but once I switched to this brand he seemed to stop getting sick. I was giving him purina kitten food before but now will stick to the BLUE brand!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Mashkory

customer_reviews.title: My cat wouldn't eat a single morsel of this
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves most things chicken or turkey flavor. She wouldn't touch this stuff. Not one single bite. I mixed some in her regular food-she flipped the dish over and separated her those food from the new food. Very odd. Oh well, the kitty rescue will be hapoy to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my girls love this
customer_reviews.text: I got twin kittens at 6 months who were small for their ages. Now at 10 months they are at the proper weight, and love eating this food. For the same cost as a meal for 3 kids and 2 adults at McDs, it's super cost effective and I believe everyone should strive for better kitten food then their fast food bill.
customer_reviews.author: M1554nn3

customer_reviews.title: Best price and kitten food
customer_reviews.text: Our vet and Petco recommended this food so we bought our first bag there for a lot more money only because we had no choice. Now I buy it here. Our cat, Hamilton has thrived on Blue Buffalo. I strongly recommend it to everyone. We are just starting to mix in adult food since Hamilton is approaching a year old. I know you can find cheaper foods but don't do it! Your pet is family so feed your pet well. Feeding Blue Buffalo! 😀😻
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great price vs Local Stores
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. I have to keep the bag in a sealed plastic container that Locks. Lol or the bandits break in. Good quality and I've noticed that my cats are very happy and in better health. Even my senior cat has become playful again!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty kitten

customer_reviews.title: My kittens seem to love this food however she had very foul smelling stool
customer_reviews.text: My kittens seem to love this food however she had very foul smelling stool. After switching to a new product (Nutro) her loose stool smells better but she seems less interested in the food.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Shady pet food, do not use or your pet will regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This product was opened and re-sealed with clear packing tape (as shown in the picture). Additionally, there is no expiration date on the packaging which seems like highly suspicious and unethical behavior as previous bags have included expiration date (purchased from other vendors). Any comments Blue Buffalo on your shady practices?
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this kitten food
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food. Although she is going on 4 years old, she still eats this. She’s very petite and somehow keeps herself the same weight. Her coat is silky and smooth and she has lots of energy.
customer_reviews.author: Carpi

customer_reviews.title: Easy transition, nutritious food, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: My cat and I love this food. Well, since I'm not the one eating it, I guess I really mean I love the brand and company moreso. They are adamant about healthy cats and provide incredibly nutritious for kittens/cats and unlike other reviews it was easy to transition to. My 14 week old kitten transitioned from Iams to Blue just fine within 14 days. I found no problems and feel the decision was well made.
customer_reviews.author: myblackdahlia

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: My kitten had major stomach and bowel issues until I switched her off this. Had tried medicines and multiple tests, but when I switched her off this it all went away.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous food.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this stuff. She was eating friskies but her poop had an awful smell and was very thin and sometimes runny, but as soon as she started eating this is been a healthier consistency and far more solid. I noticed she's been more energetic and her fur looks far better. I do wish it were grain free but it's still pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: AYonko

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 kittens and they are all growing and thriving on this food. I am not sure about the grain free fad, but am going to stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Holly R.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what it is about this food, but my cat cannot stop eating it! He recently went through a growth spurt, so he's been eating like crazy and he's one healthy little guy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST cat food to feed your furry kids
customer_reviews.text: I mix the kitten food with the Hairball control for my 3 cats and they LOVE their dry food mix, it is very goo, healthy, and a product that I personally trust for my 3 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rita

customer_reviews.title: He is happy, healthy
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves it! He is happy, healthy, & active. I read a lot of reviews before deciding which food to feed our kitten when we brought him home and decided on Blue Buffalo. We sometimes mix in some of the Blue Buffalo Wilderness. He does not seem to have any significant gas, as some reviews have mentioned. His digestive system seems to function well, no vomiting or loose poo. Since he is almost 1, we will soon transition to adult cat food, and plan to stay with Blue Buffalo Line
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love this - meow!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this - I started by mixing small portions into their current food to eventually changing it all to Blue Buffalo! This is the only product I now buy for them - I feel good feeding them with healthy, quality food!
customer_reviews.author: Tuba

customer_reviews.title: Top Of The Line!
customer_reviews.text: We switched our kitten to this right after we tried something else. We are so pleased with how much our cat loves it, and it makes us feel great knowing we are feeding him with the best. I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Barquero

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitten Food They Will Love!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 lb kitten LOVES this stuff! Since buying it, he's gone up to 1.7lbs and is a healthy growing kitty! I'm a fan of the ingredients and the Blue Buffalo brand from previous pets, every cat I've known that's tried Blue Buffalo has really liked it and seems to get full with a smaller amount than with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: H.Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Made kitty sick
customer_reviews.text: I slowly transitioned my kitten to this brand based on the advertisements and reviews. He immediately started getting sick. I eased him back to the old food with no problem. Tried again, same results. Told the vet. She wasn't shocked. She does not recommend this brand and I understand why. We've had no problems with any other brands.
customer_reviews.author: DemeyJ

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it!
customer_reviews.text: Picky Cats like it...great! Picky Dogs like it...ugh...not good, want them to eat theri own food! Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Phala Pesano

customer_reviews.title: Great product to give them the nutrients they need
customer_reviews.text: We rescued 5 baby kittens from a trash pile on my job site. 2 unfortunately passed at bottle feeding age but now the other 3 are strong and this food has helped them get the nutrition they need.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Jen

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves this food. He is not finished with that other product so I gave him a handful as a snack and he gobbled it up
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em!
customer_reviews.text: I love this food for my beautiful, fluffy cat & she adores it just as much. I cannot say enough good words about this company, as well. Even through a mix-up with an order- they were professional, extremely timely & generous. I will always recommend this brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Stamm

customer_reviews.title: High quality but small pieces
customer_reviews.text: My Bengal cat likes this food, but the pieces are very tiny and he seems to make a mess when he eats it. I still feed it to him because he enjoys it and it is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Only kind I buy
customer_reviews.text: My 6 and 3 month old kittens love this kibble! Small little pieces are easy to chew for them, high quality ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Karebear70

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coats, eyes & skin....
customer_reviews.text: My kittens started out with this brand and line when they came from the rescue I volunteer for. They love it and have then moved onto the adult indoor formula! If my rescue organization recommends it, then I’m going to trust them since they’re experts in the field, having reduced thousands over the years....
customer_reviews.author: Allie H

customer_reviews.title: Kibble for a Princess
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten prefers this kibble over wet food. She hasn't gotten bored of it either. I rescued her in a parking lot and she was teeny tiny and very thin. Now she's thriving and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Sher E.

customer_reviews.title: AMBER GIVES THIS 2 PAWS UP!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS FOOD IS THE ONLY THING MY CAT WILL EAT! I MEAN IT, SHE WILL NOT EAT TREATS OR EVEN CAN CAT FOOD. I HAVE EVEN TRIED PEOPLE TUNA! THIS IS IT! IF YOU HAVE A PICKY KITTY I WOULD TRY THIS FOOD THEY MIGHT JUST WARM UP TO IT RIGHT AWAY! THANK YOU BLUE BUFFALO!
customer_reviews.author: Lorna B Estep

customer_reviews.title: Kitten isn’t really into it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old kitten didn’t really care for this too much, and I was hoping she would since it has much better ingredients than a lot of dry cat foods out there. Guess I’ll just have to find another brand for this picky girl!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: My cats are fans
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. They don’t leave any food in the bowls unlike some foods that they don’t really touch.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My bag came in damaged, I really didn’t think anything of it because it was just a slit through the bag and all the air was depleted in it. My kittens love this food all three of them, but when this bag arrived in its condition my kittens all became sick after eating the food from this bag. They didn’t want to eat this food and when ever they did they would throw it up. Not satisfied with this order at all!
customer_reviews.author: Aby

customer_reviews.title: Cat’s Really Love Blue Buffalo.
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love the Blue Buffalo Healthy Growth dry kitten food. They really prefer the Blue Buffalo brand. Would highly recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a food for their cats..
customer_reviews.author: Gregg S.

customer_reviews.title: Great food but kitten didn't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: Kitten didn't care for it, preferred their wet food. Still have almost an entire bag, but the quality is definitely top shelf
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been feeding my 9 month old kitten this since day one. She absolutely loves it! She is a very happy and healthy kitten and I owe it all to Blue Buffalo
customer_reviews.author: Kris Bellino

customer_reviews.title: Fosters
customer_reviews.text: I am fostering two kittens who had unsteady stomachs and I could smell the issue. They're tummies settled after eating this. No more stinkies.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended it
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended it. My car pick water as well and I know this has good quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but good for kittens
customer_reviews.text: This food was recommended by my niece and my two kittens do like it. I started by leaving food out all day, but they are like two little piggies so now I feed them twice a day! August--they have now transitioned to adult food! I still buy Blue Buffalo brand.
customer_reviews.author: baesusan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KITTEN FOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 kittens adore this food! It is the best quality kitten food I have seen. I adopted 2 Bombay rescues, they were on another brand.. this kitten food is their favorite..
customer_reviews.author: Country gal Susie

customer_reviews.title: Hunking Fat  Chunk
customer_reviews.text: The best dry kitten food on the market. I had my boy on a mostly canned food diet and he was still on the small side. After switching him over he gained weight and was much more energetic.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Young

customer_reviews.title: Best kitten kibble for our busy Bengal
customer_reviews.text: We have a 7 yr old Bengal who has always eaten another brand of kitten kibble. They recently changed their formula so we tried blue buffalo kitten and it is perfectly digested. She loves it. Our vet says this is fine for a busy Bengal.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gage

customer_reviews.title: Why I Choose Blue Buffalo Kitten Food
customer_reviews.text: My Little Kitten LOVES THIS STUFF!! She Will Eat It over Her Wet Food and I know She is Getting ALL The Necessary Nutrients to Make Her Grow Big and Strong!! And THIS IS A "Win Win" For Us All!! Thank You Blue Buffalo!! A. Crochet, Dallas, Tx.
customer_reviews.author: anna crochet

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but cat doesn't seem to eat as much.
customer_reviews.text: Cat seems to like it. She hasn't told me anything different. I think she's mad at me. She's been giving me the silence treatment.
customer_reviews.author: tom knowles

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from Amazon today and what I received was not exactly as I expected. The bag had an obvious hole in it and instead of giving us a new bag, the simply covered it with masking tape. This has made me reconsider whether or not I trust giving this food to my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag arrived half empty and ripped open.
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully my kittens love what’s left of the ripped open due to packaging bag of expensive kitten food. I’ll buy this somewhere else, if they do in the future. For the prime membership cost to go up, you’d think quality would as well. Not today. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Delauter

customer_reviews.title: KITTY LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: kitty loves it and its my 3rd bag. Tiny tasting morsels perfect for kittens and Adolescent kitties with small mouths. I don't know why kitten food is so scare across all the brands so this one has worked from age 4-8 months so far.
customer_reviews.author: MargR

customer_reviews.title: We switched back to the cheap stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Cat face really did not like being forced to eat this "health" food. We stopped buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great Product BUT Open Bag Upon Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but the bag was opened. I don’t even want to use it for fear someone put something in it. It’s not worth the risk. It was also spilled inside the shipping box. I’m guessing it was just a defective bag but I still worry.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Love for my furry friends
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and cats have been eating this for years. I love the brand and I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend stuff for growing kittens. Made my little guy super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Thowra

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great! It’s really healthy and I noticed a difference after switching food.
customer_reviews.author: M. Krenzin

customer_reviews.title: Intestinal difficulties
customer_reviews.text: We gave our two cats this food because we wanted a healthy product for them. After four months we stopped. They had intestinal issues, runny movements, horrendous smell. Now on Nutrish and all is normal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cats
customer_reviews.text: The cats seem to really like it. I like it because it's healthy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Smart_Savy_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves it
customer_reviews.text: Cats love the taste and their coat looks really nice. Quality product
customer_reviews.author: Pooja Patel

customer_reviews.title: Their coats are beautiful and their eyes are shiny and they play up ...
customer_reviews.text: The mama cat was quite young when she became pregnant and somebody dumped her. I rescued her and her four babies. I have five young cats eating this kitten formula and they are sooooo healthy. Their coats are beautiful and their eyes are shiny and they play up a storm!!! So far they're all healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I switched my kitty to this and he loves it! He was on iams and it was making him gain weight. This food is a great kitten food. The price is reasonable for the amount that you get. The only thing I don't like is that it makes him burp a lot. But other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: and seem to be healthy and happy. Great reviews from vets about this food and ...
customer_reviews.text: Kittens eat it no problem, and seem to be healthy and happy. Great reviews from vets about this food and the price is great. I've read others say their cats have digestive problems, but I switched to this after the food the vet gave me and its been around a month now with great results.
customer_reviews.author: bretabaker

customer_reviews.title: Stinky poo
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this food but it makes her poo stink like no other. Definitely can't buy it again for her. Can't. Breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Kitten Loves It
customer_reviews.text: How do humans rate the flavor of cat food? I personally didn't taste it but my kitten Winston seems to like this food very much. It is a little smelly, but it's cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Youngpeter

customer_reviews.title: Try a new flavor!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten 🐱 wouldn’t eat this. She loved the blue adult food. Who knows. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Duck

customer_reviews.title: Good to my cat
customer_reviews.text: It's good as my cat really love it. What's interesting is, as I have mild allergy to my cat, when my cat ate this, my allergic reaction went worse. When I changed it to Instinct my allergy became better. I am not sure what's the exact reason, or maybe I am allergic to the food myself.
customer_reviews.author: IZZZZ

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Healthy Growth Natural Kitten Dry Cat Food
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Healthy Growth Chicken & Brown Rice| Size:7 lbBlue for cats dry cat food recipes are made with the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals. Starting with real meat as the 1St ingredient, they include wholesome grains, veggies and fruit, plus our exclusive, antioxidant-rich life source bits to support your feline’s overall health and well-being. Blue for cats has formulations to meet all of your cat’s life stage and lifestyle needs, from hairball and weight control to sensitive stomach and healthy aging recipes. Blue for cats is a product of the Blue Buffalo Company. Based in the United States, Blue Buffalo makes premium-quality pet foods.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Formulated to support the health and well-being of your feline friend, BLUE for Cats features only the finest natural ingredients: Delicious, protein-rich, Deboned Chicken. Wholesome whole grains and veggies. NO chicken (or poultry) by-product meals
feature_bullets: Real meat first: Blue Buffalo dry kitten food always features real meat as the first ingredient. High-quality protein from real chicken helps your kitten build strong muscles. Plus, it contains wholesome Whole grains, garden veggies and fruit.
Formulated for kittens: specially formulated to meet the needs of growing kittens, Blue Healthy growth kitten Food contains DHA, Ara, and Choline to support healthy cognitive and retinal development.

With life source Bits: this formula contains blue's exclusive life source Bits – a precise blend of antioxidants, vitamins and minerals carefully selected by holistic veterinarians and animal nutritionists, to support immune system health, life stage requirements, and a healthy oxidative balance.

Natural cat food: Blue dry kitten food is formulated for the health and well-being of your kitten and features the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals. It never contains chicken (or poultry) by-product meals, corn, wheat, soy, artificial flavors or preservatives.
Contains one (1) 7 lb. Bag of blue Healthy growth natural kitten dry Cat Food, Chicken & brown rice
